ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: i ve been able to accidentaly remove SOW or a high level symbol :( ... From: Perhaps a Princess...  To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
i've been able to accidentaly remove SOW or a high level symbol :(

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... <sarah@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, August 23, 1999 12:16 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour


>From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
>That is true as far as I have been able to experiment :(
>Even beneficial spelsl.
>
>On Mon, 23 Aug 1999, The Scotts wrote:
>
>> From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>
>>
>> Actually to my knowledge you can only remove your own spells not ones
that
>> were casted on you:(
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
>> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>> Date: Monday, August 23, 1999 12:37 PM
>> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour
>>
>>
>> >From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>> >
>> >You realize, if you dont like the buffs someone gives you you can left
>> >click on their icon and it will remove the effect?? Just do that if you
>> >are 'Rping'. (No it doesnt work against negative effects like root. :)
>> >).
>> >
>> >Mr. J Daniels
>> >> >
>> >> > No immature is when you give a player all your buffs just
becuase
>> they
>> >> >wanted to RP and didn't want your help and yes it does ruin the Rping
>> >> >enviroment. And we are not going ot turn this into some kind of
blown
>> out
>> >> >argument just becuase you think that my life is this game.
>> >
